metadata.title: CVE-2020-8159 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
There is a vulnerability in actionpack_page-caching gem < v1.2.1 that allows an attacker to write arbitrary files to a web server, potentially resulting in remote code execution if the attacker can write unescaped ERB to a view.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-8159` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ruby-actionpack-page-caching - 1.2.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby-actionpack-page-caching package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.2-1').
